description: The query 'Häuser um Fragen zu malen' translates to 'Houses to paint questions'. The vocabulary includes the user 'Maria', the object 'house', the activity 'paint', and the object 'question'. The matrix represents the relationships between these terms, where 'paint' (activity) is associated with 'house' (object) and 'question' (object) using the 'perform' (id 8) and 'target' (id 9) type codes, respectively.
